films.title: Taxi driver
films.synopsis: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action.

films.title: Interstellar
films.synopsis: The film follows a group of astronauts who travel through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new home for mankind.

films.title: The Good, The Bad And The Ugly
films.synopsis: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

films.title: Your Name
films.synopsis: It depicts the story of high school students Taki Tachibana and Mitsuha Miyamizu, who suddenly began to swap bodies despite having never met.

films.title: Weathering with you
films.synopsis: It follows a 16-year-old high school boy, Hodaka Morishima, who runs away from his troubled rural home to Tokyo, and later befriends Hina Amano, an orphaned girl who has the ability to control the weather.

films.title: The Devil's Advocate
films.synopsis: As his wife becomes haunted by frightening visions, the lawyer slowly realizes the firm's owner, John Milton, is in fact, the Devil.

films.title: American Psycho
films.synopsis: American Psycho is an extraordinarily graphic description of obscene violence, which is spliced with reviews of music by Phil Collins and Whitney Houston.

films.title: Magnolia
films.synopsis: The film is an epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of happiness, forgiveness and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

films.title: Eyes Wide Shut
films.synopsis: A doctor becomes obsessed with having a sexual encounter after his wife admits to having sexual fantasies about a man she met and chastising him for dishonesty.

films.title: The Great Escape
films.synopsis: The game follows an unnamed prisoner of war who has been interned in a POW camp somewhere in northern Germany in 1942.

films.title: A King in New York
films.synopsis: It is about a recently-deposed European monarch who seeks shelter in New York City. Charles Chaplin and Maxine Audley give fantastic performances.
April 1917, the Western Front. Two young British soldiers during the First World War are given an impossible mission.

films.title: Darkest Hour
films.synopsis: In May 1940 Britain and France are Allies in World War II against Nazi Germany. Hitler has already invaded Czechoslovakia, Poland, Denmark and Norway.

films.title: Born to be Blue
films.synopsis: In the late 1960s, jazz trumpeter Chet Baker (Ethan Hawke) begins a romance with an actress (Carmen Ejogo) while trying to stage a musical comeback.

films.title: The Butterfly Effect
films.synopsis: A college-age Evan decides to cracks the cover of his journals and the inexplicable happens: He is bodily transported into those repressed memories.

films.title: Meet Joe Black
films.synopsis: A movie about a rich man trying to negotiate the terms of his own death. It is a movie about a woman who falls in love with a concept.

films.title: Apocalypse Now
films.synopsis: U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

films.title: Into the Wild
films.synopsis: Based on the true story of 22 year-old Christopher McCandless who walked out of his privileged life and promising future to become a back-to-nature wanderer in the 1990s. On the way, he encounters a series of adventures and people that will all shape him in a unique, meaningful way.

films.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
films.synopsis: One summer, Jem and Scout befriend a boy named Dill, who has come to live in their neighborhood for the summer, and the trio acts out stories together.

films.title: The Great Dictator
films.synopsis: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

films.title: Ali G Indahouse
films.synopsis: Ali G is the leader of Da West Staines Massiv, a fictional gang composed of wannabe gangsters from Staines. Their chief rivals are Da East Staines Massiv.

films.title: This is the End
films.synopsis: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city.

films.title: Koe No Katachi
films.synopsis: A deaf girl, Shoko, is bullied by the popular Shoya, then a heartwarming tale of Shouya's reunion with Shouko and his honest attempts to redeem himself.

films.title: Garden of Words
films.synopsis: On a rainy morning in Tokyo, 15-year-old Takao, an aspiring shoemaker, decides to skip class to sketch designs in a beautiful garden.

films.title: The Highway Men
films.synopsis: The untold true story of the legendary detectives who brought down Bonnie and Clyde. The outlaws made headlines. The lawmen made history.

films.title: Seven
films.synopsis: The story follows two detectives, one retiring and one his replacement, jointly investigating a series of ritualistic murders inspired by the seven deadly sins.

films.title: The Matrix
films.synopsis: The Matrix is a computer-generated dream world designed to keep these humans under control. Humans are kept sedated, effectively living a virtual life.

films.title: Dallas Buyers Club
films.synopsis: Ron Woodroof (Matthew McConaughey) is a foul-mouthed Texan electrician and part-time rodeo rider who is addicted to drugs and sex.

films.title: Casino
films.synopsis: In the early-1970s Las Vegas, low-level mobster Sam 'Ace' Rothstein (Robert De Niro) gets tapped by his bosses to head the Tangiers Casino.

films.title: Good Will Hunting
films.synopsis: Will Hunting, a janitor at MIT, has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

films.title: Schindler's List
films.synopsis: Businessman Oskar Schindler (Liam Neeson) arrives in Krakow in 1939, ready to make his fortune from World War II, which has just started.

films.title: The Pianist
films.synopsis: During WWII, acclaimed Polish musician Wladyslaw faces various struggles as he loses contact with his family.

films.title: Dunkirk
films.synopsis: Four hundred thousand British and French soldiers are holed up in the French port town of Dunkirk.

films.title: Fight Club
films.synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

films.title: Saving Private Ryan
films.synopsis: Captain John Miller (Tom Hanks) takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat.

films.title: Dead Poets Society
films.synopsis: A new English teacher, John Keating (Robin Williams), is introduced to an all-boys preparatory school that is known for its ancient traditions and high standards. He uses unorthodox methods to reach out to his students, who face enormous pressures from their parents and the school.

films.title: Small Soldiers
films.synopsis: When teenager Alan (Gregory Smith) buys a set of Commando Elite action figures, he's unaware that they have been programmed with military technology. The toys, including leader Chip (Tommy Lee Jones), spring to life and start taking their directives seriously, beginning by 'killing' their enemies, the toy Gorgonites.

films.title: The Goonies
films.synopsis: A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

films.title: Chicken Run
films.synopsis: Set in the countryside of Yorkshire, the plot centres on a group of British anthropomorphic chickens who see an American rooster named Rocky Rhodes as their only hope to escape the farm when their owners want to turn them into chicken pies.

films.title: It
films.synopsis: A group of social outcasts who are bullied by a gang of greasers led by Henry Bowers are also tormented by an evil demon who can shape-shift into a clown.

films.title: The Babadook
films.synopsis: A single mother and her child fall into a deep well of paranoia when an eerie children's book titled 'Mister Babadook' manifests in their home.

films.title: The Woman in Black: Angel of Death
films.synopsis: During WWII, the London bombings force two schoolteachers to evacuate a group of children to the coastal village of Crythin Gifford.

films.title: Brimstone
films.synopsis: In the menacing inferno of the old North-American West, Liz is a genuine survivor who is hunted by a vengeful preacher for a crime she didn't commit.

films.title: El Camino
films.synopsis: Fugitive Jesse Pinkman runs from his captors, the law, and his past.

films.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
films.synopsis: Set in 1969 Los Angeles, the film follows a fading actor and his stunt double as they navigate the rapidly changing film industry, with the threat of the Tate murders looming.

films.title: The Hateful Eight
films.synopsis: About eight violent people who, during a blizzard, meet in a inn and learn they may have reasons to fight each other.

films.title: Django Unchained
films.synopsis: The main themes of Django Unchained are slavery, revenge, and justice. It follows Django, a slave who is freed from his chains by a German bounty hunter named Dr. King Schultz (Christoph Waltz) and trained to be a bounty hunter himself.

films.title: Inglourious Basterds
films.synopsis: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

films.title: Kill Bill
films.synopsis: At her wedding, they move in and kill everyone she loves, and leave her with a bullet in her brain. Awaking from a coma four years later, she instantly begins plotting retribution.

films.title: Kill Bill 2
films.synopsis: The Bride resumes her quest for justice, taking aim at Budd and Elle Driver, the only survivors from the squad of assassins who betrayed her four years earlier.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

films.title: Reservoir Dogs
films.synopsis: A gang of thieves carry out an armed robbery on a diamond warehouse. The police are after them so quickly that they suspect they have a rat in their company.

films.title: Quadrophenia
films.synopsis: To prepare for the weekend, the friends attempt to buy some recreational drugs from London gangster Harry North (John Bindon), but are cheated with fake pills.

films.title: The Doors
films.synopsis: The movie follows Morrison from his days as a film student in Los Angeles to his death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

films.title: Full Metal Jacket
films.synopsis: A two-segment story that follows young men from the start of recruit training in the Marine Corps to the lethal cauldron known as Vietnam.

films.title: The Shining
films.synopsis: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter, where a sinister presence influences the father into violence.

films.title: Clockwork Orange
films.synopsis: Alex DeLarge is an 'ultraviolent' youth in futuristic Britain. As with all luck, his eventually runs out and he's arrested and convicted of murder.

films.title: Lolita
films.synopsis: It follows a middle-aged literature lecturer who becomes obsessed with an adolescent girl.

films.title: 2001 A Space Odyssey
films.synopsis: When a mysterious artifact is uncovered on the Moon, a spacecraft manned by two humans and one supercomputer is sent to Jupiter to find its origins.

films.title: Paths of Glory
films.synopsis: A colonel defends three of his soldiers in a court-martial after they abandon a suicidal attack.

films.title: Mud
films.synopsis: Two young boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the vigilantes that are on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

films.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
films.synopsis: Mick Haller is a defense lawyer who works out of his Lincoln. When a wealthy Realtor is accused of assaulting a prostitute, Haller is asked to defend him.

films.title: White Boy Rick
films.synopsis: Based on the moving, true story of a blue-collar father (McConaughey) and his teenage son, Rick Wershe Jr. (Merritt), who became an undercover police informant and later a drug dealer, before he was abandoned by his handlers and sentenced to life in prison.

films.title: You Were Never Really Here
films.synopsis: A traumatized mercenary named Joe (Phoenix) is hired by a politician to find and rescue his daughter who has been kidnapped by a human trafficking network, which Joe is instructed to destroy by any violent means.

films.title: A Ghost Story
films.synopsis: A white-sheeted ghost returns to his suburban home to console his bereft wife, only to find that in his spectral state he has become unstuck in time.

films.title: The Social Network
films.synopsis: In 2003, Harvard undergrad and computer genius Mark Zuckerberg (Jesse Eisenberg) begins work on a new concept that eventually turns into the global social network known as Facebook.

films.title: The Truman Show
films.synopsis: An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

films.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
films.synopsis: This is the story of a guy, Joel, who discovers that his long-time girlfriend, Clementine, has undergone a psychiatrist's experimental procedure.

films.title: The Mule
films.synopsis: A ninety-year-old horticulturist and Korean War veteran turns drug mule for a Mexican cartel.

films.title: Gran Torino
films.synopsis: After a Hmong teenager tries to steal his prized 1972 Gran Torino, a disgruntled, prejudiced Korean War veteran seeks to redeem both the boy and himself.

films.title: Million Dollar Baby
films.synopsis: Maggie becomes an extraordinarily successful fighter, always knocking out her opponent in the first round.

films.title: Cry Macho
films.synopsis: A one-time rodeo star and washed-up horse breeder takes a job to bring a man's young son home and away from his alcoholic mom.

films.title: Trainspotting
films.synopsis: A wild, freeform, Rabelaisian trip through the darkest recesses of Edinburgh low-life, focusing on Mark Renton and his attempt to give up his heroin habit.

films.title: Trainspotting 2
films.synopsis: After 20 years abroad, Mark Renton returns to Scotland and reunites with his old friends Sick Boy, Spud, and Begbie.

films.title: (500) Days of Summer)
films.synopsis: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman (Deschanel) who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man (Gordon-Levitt) who falls for her.

films.title: The Notebook
films.synopsis: In a modern-day nursing home, an elderly man named Duke (James Garner) begins to read a love story from his notebook to a female fellow patient (Gena Rowlands).

films.title: Harry Potter and the prisoner of Azkaban
films.synopsis: A dangerous criminal and Voldemort's trusted aide Sirius Black (Gary Oldman) has escaped from Azkaban Prison and wants to kill Harry to avenge the Dark Lord.

films.title: Phantom Thread
films.synopsis: Set in 1950s London, Reynolds Woodcock is a renowned dressmaker whose fastidious life is disrupted by a young, strong-willed woman, Alma, who becomes his muse and his lover.

films.title: Joker
films.synopsis: Arthur Fleck, a party clown and a failed stand-up comedian, leads an impoverished life with his ailing mother.

films.title: In Time
films.synopsis: 28-year-old factory worker Will Salas (Justin Timberlake) lives with his mother Rachel (Olivia Wilde) in the ghettos.

films.title: Sully
films.synopsis: Pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger and co-pilot Jeff Skiles land an Airbus A320 with one hundred fifty-five passengers on the Hudson River saving their lives.

films.title: Lone Survivor
films.synopsis: Marcus Luttrell, a Navy Seal, and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005.

films.title: American Sniper
films.synopsis: US Navy SEAL Chris Kyle (Bradley Cooper) takes his sole mission, protecting his comrades, to heart and becomes one of the most lethal snipers in American history.

films.title: Fury
films.synopsis: A battle-hardened Army sergeant named Wardaddy commands a five-man Sherman tank crew on a deadly mission behind enemy lines.

films.title: La lengua de las Mariposas
films.synopsis: Finales de invierno de 1936. En un pequeño pueblo gallego, Moncho, un niño de 8 años, se incorpora a la escuela tras una larga enfermedad.

films.title: Las Verdes Praderas
films.synopsis: José, un ejecutivo de origen humilde, ha alcanzado el éxito dentro de la empresa de publicidad para la que trabaja, gracias a su talento innato para encontrar la frase exacta. Es el paradigma del hombre que se ha hecho a sí mismo y ha convertido en realidad sus sueños de niño: una familia, un chalet en la sierra, un coche... Sin embargo, un fin de semana en el que esperaba disfrutar de su chalet se convierte en una sucesión de problemas que no lo dejan descansar ni un momento. Entonces empieza a cuestionarse su vida y a preguntarse si verdaderamente coincide con sus sueños.

films.title: El Bola
films.synopsis: El Bola es un chaval de 12 años que vive en una atmósfera violenta y sórdida. Su situación familiar, que oculta avergonzado, le incapacita para relacionarse y comunicarse con otros chicos. La llegada de un nuevo compañero al colegio le brinda la oportunidad de descubrir la amistad y una realidad familiar completamente distinta. Todo ello le dará la fuerza necesaria para aceptar y, además, afrontar su propia situación.

films.title: Casa en Flames
films.synopsis: La trama de Casa en llamas sigue a Montse mientras intenta organizar un fin de semana ideal con su familia en su casa de verano en la Costa Brava.

films.title: Que Nadie Duerma
films.synopsis: Lucía pierde su empleo como programadora informática y decide dar un giro en su vida: convertirse en taxista. Al volante de su taxi, recorriendo las calles de Madrid, esperará pacientemente la ocasión de llevar en él a su vecino desaparecido, del que se ha enamorado.

films.title: Back to the future
films.synopsis: Marty McFly is thrown back into the '50s when an experiment by his eccentric scientist friend Doc Brown goes awry.

films.title: Back to the future Part II
films.synopsis: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

films.title: Back to the future Part III
films.synopsis: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.

films.title: E.T
films.synopsis: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.

films.title: Jaws
films.synopsis: When a massive killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community off Long Island, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.

films.title: Casablanca
films.synopsis: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

films.title: Dr.Strangelove
films.synopsis: An unhinged American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

films.title: Barry Lyndon
films.synopsis: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

films.title: Spartacus
films.synopsis: The slave Spartacus survives brutal training as a gladiator and leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic, as the ambitious Crassus seeks to gain power by crushing the uprising.

films.title: Citizen Kane
films.synopsis: The story follows the investigation into the origins of 'Rosebud' the mysterious word Kane utters on his deathbed.

films.title: The Irishman
films.synopsis: A war veteran narrates the true story and journey of how he was hired as a hitman for a wealthy family and how he assassinated someone by becoming trustworthy friends with them, and how it all of this affected his relationship with his own family.

films.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
films.synopsis: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to become a wealthy stockbroker living the high life to his downfall, involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

films.title: Goodfellas
films.synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mafia, covering his relationship with his wife Karen and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.

films.title: The Silence of the Lambs
films.synopsis: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

films.title: The Iron Giant
films.synopsis: This is the story of a nine-year-old boy named Hogarth Hughes who makes friends with an innocent alien giant robot that came from outer space.
